divs: Sighting Detailsduring the month of November I'm sorry i don't have a proper date of sighting but it was in November i accidentally caught a UFO on my digital device.. I can send images but for some reason im having trouble uploading them to send to you. i see this as a speeding UFO at some point it slowed down then shot off again
trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Columbus
There were no other sightings in Columbus on or around November 11th 2012
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
